verbs.description: [ARG0: The president] [V: has] [ARG1: the power to “ order the termination of an investigation by the Justice Department or FBI at any time and for any reason] , ” Trump lawyers John Dowd and Jay Sekulow argued in the letter to Robert S Mueller III .

[ARG0: The president] has the power to “ [V: order] [ARG2: the termination of an investigation by the Justice Department or FBI] [ARGM-TMP: at any time] [ARG2: and for any reason] , ” Trump lawyers John Dowd and Jay Sekulow argued in the letter to Robert S Mueller III .

The president has the power to “ order the termination of an investigation by the Justice Department or FBI at any time and for any reason , ” [ARG0: Trump lawyers John Dowd and Jay Sekulow] [V: argued] [ARGM-LOC: in the letter to Robert S Mueller III] .
